ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Are URI-Templates really coupling clients and server?
ygData.msgSnippet: Neither coupling nor change is a problem as long as you re able to control and manage it. Subbu

Neither coupling nor change is a problem as long as you're able to control =
and manage it. 

Subbu

On Aug 28, 2011, at 2:00 AM, Jakob Strauch wrote:

=
> I dont see any coupling - it is not said, that an URI Template connot cha=
nged either over time. As long as the server communicates the templates - l=
ike URIs - in resource representations, where is the problem?
